description: From French picrique, from Ancient Greek πικρός (pikrós, “bitter”).

adjectives.description: picric (comparative more picric, superlative most picric)

entries.meaning: Designating a type of bitter yellow acid.
examples: Baldy had not moved since lying down, and his regular and somewhat sterterous breathing  […]  told Monica that he was alive and resting comfortably. “A week of rest and good care and some picric acid on your burns will put you right, Baldy,” Monica told him.
